text: Hey Yall.. Anyone having an issue where you are required to select a table for dynamic content even though there isn’t dynamic content on the page?
<@U38EZFVFE> yes, just ran into this myself.
I believe there used to be a checkbox on pages to signal whether it's to be used as a dynamic page or not. It looks like it's gone now.

I’ve noticed this new code in the email for the first name token. In the rich text it appears as: Hello {{ personalization_token(“contact.firstname”, “Friend”) }},
. In the plain text it appears as: Hello {{ if contact_without_defaults.firstname }}{{contact_without_defaults.firstname}}{{ else }}Friend{{ end }},. If I send myself a plain text test blast and select “Receive email as specific contact”, I see Hello NameFriend in my inbox. Is this a bug? Can anyone shed any light on this?
Shouldn’t those if/else statements be wrapped in single brackets with the percent signs?
Not sure if it’s different for emails
Question for those who attended the Developer AMA last week... Did you receive my follow up email with the recording and links? ((just double checking it sent properly))
